subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Curry received a warm welcome as he scored 40 points — 28 in the third quarter — to help the Warriors improve to 20-0 with a win over the Hornets on Wednesday in Charlotte, N.C., where he grew up.
snippet: Curry received a warm welcome as he scored 40 points — 28 in the third quarter — to help the Warriors improve to 20-0 with a win over the Hornets on Wednesday in Charlotte, N.C., where he grew up.
